intro: Pterospartum lasianthum, commonly known as the yellow pterospartum, is a flowering plant native to South America, particularly Brazil. It belongs to the Leguminosae family, also known as the bean or legume family, and is characterized by its compound leaves and showy yellow flowers. The plant produces small, pod-like fruits that contain several seeds, typical of many legumes. It is often found in dry, sandy soils and is adapted to thrive in arid environments.
